name: Glam Descent
description: The game is an addictive reaction speed and skill challenge. In the game, white clouds will constantly appear at the bottom of the screen, and these white clouds will move upward at a continuous speed. The player controls the left and right movement of the character through A and D, if the white cloud is brought to the top of the screen, or steps on the spike, the player's character will be damaged and deducted blood, if it falls directly to the bottom, the game will fail directly. There are items in the game that can score points or return blood. A certain number of points accumulated in the game will unlock the beauty picture.
